Package index

Skeletonization

Function to calculate straight skeletons

skeletonize()
Skeletonize a polygon

2D Inset Polygons

Function to calculate 2D inset polygons

generate_offset_polygon()
Generate an offset polygon

3D Bevels

Functions to generate 3D bevels

generate_roof()
Generate a 3D roof model
generate_beveled_polygon()
Generate a beveled 3D polygon
change_polygon_bevel()
Change an existing polygon bevel's bevel profile.

2D Profiles

Functions to generate 2D bevel profiles

generate_bevel()
Generate 2D Bevel Profile for 3D Polygons
generate_complex_bevel()
Generate Complex 2D Bevel Profile for 3D Polygons

Plotting

Functions to plot skeletons and bevels

plot_offset_polygon()
Plot Offset Polygons
plot_skeleton()
Plot the Straight Skeleton of a Polygon

pkgdown utils

Internal but must be exported to meet CRAN guidelines

run_docs_raybevel()
Run Documentation
